item.description: Obviously procrastination and keeping career on track are huge issues, but have you also been struggling with being reliable in friendships, poor impulse control, and a tendency to make self-sabotaging choices? Any interest in discussing these? ...This topic has attracted 17 "Yes" RSVPs so far in a Chicago Meetup group whose mission involves decluttering, so I'm curious what response it might generate in Boston. Ideas for date and location are welcomed!

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Impulse control / decision making / balancing relationships
